title: Please help me identify this font
content:
Hi people,

could you please help me identifying this two fonts?  
They´ve been taken from:

[http://www.rocherms.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/www.rocherms.com/ "http://www.rocherms.com/")  
 [http://www.toddhido.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/www.toddhido.com/ "http://www.toddhido.com/")

(see attached files)

thanks a lot!

luis

| --- | --- |
| [Imagen 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/typophile.com/files/Imagen%204.png) | 4.49 KB |
| [Imagen 6.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/typophile.com/files/Imagen%206.png) | 5.83 KB |

 [‹ Serif font....](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47847 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Serif face used for Richard Quay's online resume - Foundry Wilson {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47790 "Go to next forum topic")
author: luisdiaz

comments.content: the second image is quite similar to [Drifter-Five](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122052926/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/Drifter.html).
